Plot: In Tuscany to promote his latest book, a middle-aged British writer meets a French woman who leads him to the village of Lucignano. While there, a chance question reveals something deeper.
Title: Certified Copy
Writer: Caroline Eliacheff (collaborator on screenplay), Abbas Kiarostami
Actors: Juliette Binoche, William Shimell, Jean-Claude Carrière, Agathe Natanson
tomatoConsensus: The main stars are absolutely perfect in this absorbing, existential drama that dissects human relationships.
